        <script>
(function(){
  if (window.BOOMR && window.BOOMR.version) { return; }
  var dom,doc,where,iframe = document.createElement("iframe"),win = window;

  function boomerangSaveLoadTime(e) {
    win.BOOMR_onload=(e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }
  if (win.addEventListener) {
    win.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false);
  } else if (win.attachEvent) {
    win.attachEvent("onload", boomerangSaveLoadTime);
  }

  iframe.src = "javascript:void(0)";
  iframe.title = ""; iframe.role = "presentation";
  (iframe.frameElement || iframe).style.cssText = "width:0;height:0;border:0;display:none;";
  where = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
  where.parentNode.insertBefore(iframe, where);

  try {
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  } catch(e) {
    dom = document.domain;
    iframe.src="javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='"+dom+"';void(0);";
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  }
  doc.open()._l = function() {
    var js = this.createElement("script");
    if (dom) { this.domain = dom; }
    js.id = "boomr-if-as";
    js.src = "//c.go-mpulse.net/boomerang/" +
    "SUWW2-HAKPB-Q4WN7-TQ6VL-GTMT2";
    BOOMR_lstart=new Date().getTime();
    this.body.appendChild(js);
  };
  doc.write('<body onload="document._l();">');
  doc.close();
})();
</script>

                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">Important Information about Writing Samples</h1>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Writing samples are a crucial piece of our admissions process for the MPhil Stud.</li>
<li>We ask for <strong>two</strong> pieces around <strong>2000 words </strong>each (excluding bibliography). </li>
<li>The short length is because we deal with so many applications.</li>
<li>We ask for two as we do not want to make the decision on seeing only one piece of work.</li>
<li>If you send in longer pieces we cannot guarantee they will be read in their entirety.</li>
<li>Longer pieces with highlighted sections can be submitted although we would caution against this as it is not always possible to get a feel for an argument from a section. </li>
<li>Remember you are in competition with many other applicants so it is worth taking some time to work on a piece that fulfils the requirements.</li>
</ul>


<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>

</ul>


</section>

        <article class="block block--col-2">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>

  <i class="fa None"></i>

</ul>

    win.BOOMR_onload=(e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">The Academic Voice</h1>


<h3 class="heading"><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud/columns/academic-voice">The Academic Voice</a></h3>




<a class="image" href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud/columns/academic-voice" title="Statue on UCL Portico" target="_self"><img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/images/images-for-prospective-student-pages/UCL_Portico_statue.jpg" width="313" height="208" alt="Statue on UCL Portico" class="small-image" title="Statue on UCL Portico" /></a>

<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Scholarships &amp; Funding</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/scholarships" target="_self">Scholarships &amp; Funding (Overview)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/fees-funding" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/taught/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Taught)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Resarch)</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Open Days</h2>

</ul>


</section>

</div>

    href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud/columns/academic-voice/edit"><img class="zero-bottom lazy" height="10" width="10" alt="Edit Icon" title="Edit Content" src="//cdn.ucl.ac.uk/img/blank.gif" data-src="//cdn.ucl.ac.uk/skins/UCLIndigoSkin/default-theme/images/edit.gif" id="edit_button"></a></span>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>

  }

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">The Student Voice</h1>


<h3 class="heading"><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud/columns/student-voice">The Student Voice</a></h3>




<a class="image" href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud/columns/student-voice" title="UCL Philosophy students" target="_self"><img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/images/images-for-prospective-student-pages/UCL_Philosopy_students.jpg" width="313" height="209" alt="UCL Philosophy students" class="small-image" title="UCL Philosophy students" /></a>

<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Scholarships &amp; Funding</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/scholarships" target="_self">Scholarships &amp; Funding (Overview)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/fees-funding" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>

<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Resarch)</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i>

</ul>

    win.BOOMR_onload=(e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }
  if (win.addEventListener) {
    win.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false);

<h1 class="heading">Graduate (Taught)</h1>

  <section class="middle-split__column1">

</ul>

(function(){
  if (window.BOOMR && window.BOOMR.version) { return; }
  var dom,doc,where,iframe = document.createElement("iframe"),win = window;

  function boomerangSaveLoadTime(e) {
    win.BOOMR_onload=(e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }
  if (win.addEventListener) {
    win.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false);
  } else if (win.attachEvent) {
    win.attachEvent("onload", boomerangSaveLoadTime);
  }

  iframe.src = "javascript:void(0)";
  iframe.title = ""; iframe.role = "presentation";
  (iframe.frameElement || iframe).style.cssText = "width:0;height:0;border:0;display:none;";
  where = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
  where.parentNode.insertBefore(iframe, where);

  try {
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  } catch(e) {
    dom = document.domain;
    iframe.src="javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='"+dom+"';void(0);";
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  }
  doc.open()._l = function() {
    var js = this.createElement("script");
    if (dom) { this.domain = dom; }
    js.id = "boomr-if-as";
    js.src = "//c.go-mpulse.net/boomerang/" +
    "SUWW2-HAKPB-Q4WN7-TQ6VL-GTMT2";
    BOOMR_lstart=new Date().getTime();
    this.body.appendChild(js);
  };
  doc.write('<body onload="document._l();">');
  doc.close();
})();
</script>

                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 

<html>

    
        <script>
            require(["theme/tabs"]);
            require(["theme/ug"]);
        </script>
        <script>            var ajaxyear = '2018';
                                                var ajaxroot = 'http://www.ucl.ac.uk/indigo-ucl-prospectus-taught-degrees';</script>
        



            
                
                

                 <div class="prospectus--programme prospectus--programme--last">
                        

                        <h2>Philosophy MA</h2>

                        
                            <div class="copy__section copy__anchor scrollspy" id="standfirst">
                                <p class="copy__intro">The Philosophy MA enables students to benefit from the acknowledged expertise of UCL's lively, close-knit intellectual community, and also access the stimulation and dynamism of London's wider philosophical community. The programme offers the flexibility for recent graduates in the subject to study chosen topics in greater depth.</p>
                            </div>
                        

                        
                            
       
            <section id="key-information" class="copy__section copy__section--key__information">
                <div class="island island--highlight island--subtle-highlight clearfix">
                    <h3 class="copy__heading">Key Information</h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        <div class="clearfix">
                            <h5>Programme starts</h5>
                            <p>September 2018</p>
                        </div>
                    

                    <section class="threecolumns">
                        

                        

                        
                    </section>

                    

                    

                    

                   <div>
                        
                        
                        <div>
                            <strong>Location:</strong> London, Bloomsbury
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <hr class="clearfix">
                    
                </div>
            </section>
        
    
                        

                        


                        

                        
    
       
                        
    

                        


                        
                        
                        
    
                        

                        

                        

                        <p class="zero-bottom">
                            Degree last modified on 6 October 2017 at 13:41 by UCL Student Recruitment Marketing.
                        </p>
                    </div>

                    

                
            
        
    
</html>
<p class="p">Philosophy (BA) graduates who intend to progress to PhD study are advised to apply for the two year Master of Philosophical Studies <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud" target="_self">(MPhil Stud)</a>. </p>






<div id="accordion">

<dl class="accordion">
    

<dt class="accordion__title"><a href="#">Key Information</a></dt>
<dd class="accordion__description" style="display: none;">
     <div>
<html>

    
        <script>
            require(["theme/tabs"]);
            require(["theme/ug"]);
        </script>
        <script>            var ajaxyear = '2018';
                                                var ajaxroot = 'http://www.ucl.ac.uk/indigo-ucl-prospectus-taught-degrees';</script>
        



            
                
                

                 <div class="prospectus--programme prospectus--programme--last">
                        

                        

                        

                        
                            
       
            <section id="key-information" class="copy__section copy__section--key__information">
                <div class="island island--highlight island--subtle-highlight clearfix">
                    <h3 class="copy__heading">Key Information</h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        <div class="clearfix">
                            <h5>Programme starts</h5>
                            <p>September 2018</p>
                        </div>
                    

                    <section class="threecolumns">
                        
                            <section style="border-width:0"
    class="threecolumns__column1">
                                <h5>Modes and duration</h5>
                                <div>
                                    <strong>Full time:</strong>
                                    1 year
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                    <strong>Part time:</strong>
                                    2 years
                                </div>
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                
                                
                            </section>
                        

                        
                            <section style="border-width:0"
    class="threecolumns__column2">
                                <h5>Tuition Fees (2018/19)</h5>
                                <dl class="list--defined">
                                    
                                        <dt>UK/EU:</dt>
                                        <dd>
                                            
                                                <span>
                                                    &#163;10,140 (FT)
                                                </span>
                                            
                                           
                                                <span>
                                                    &#163;5,120 (PT)
                                                </span>
                                            
                                        </dd>
                                    
                                    
                                        <dt>Overseas:</dt>
                                        <dd>
                                            
                                                <span>
                                                    &#163;21,160 (FT)
                                                </span>

                                                    &#163;10,740 (PT)
                                                </span>
                                            
                                        </dd>
                                    
                                </dl>
                            </section>
                        

                        
                            <section style="border-width:0"
    class="threecolumns__column3">
                                <h5>Application deadlines</h5>
                                <div>
                                    <div><strong>All applicants</strong></div>
                                    <div>Open: 16 October 2017</div>
                                    <div>Close: 1 February 2018</div>
                                </div>
                                
                                
                                
                                
                            </section>
                        
                    </section>

                    
                        <div>
                            <p>
                                <b>Note on fees:</b>
                                The tuition fees shown are for the year indicated above. Fees for subsequent years may increase or otherwise vary. Further information on fee status, fee increases and the fee schedule can be viewed on the <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/students/fees">UCL Current Students website</a>.
                                
                            </p>
                        </div>
                    

                    

                    

                   <div>
                        
                        
                        <div>
                            <strong>Location:</strong> London, Bloomsbury
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <hr class="clearfix">
                    <div class="middle-split clearfix">
                        <section>
                            
                                <h5>Entry requirements</h5>
                                <p>A minimum of a upper second-class Bachelor's degree in philosophy from a UK university or an overseas qualification of an equivalent standard. Applicants with a strong degree in a non-philosophical subject are welcome.</p>
                            
                            

                            <h5>English Language Requirements</h5>
                            <p>If your education has not been conducted in the English language, you will be expected to demonstrate evidence of an adequate level of English proficiency.</p>
                            <p>The English language level for this programme is: <strong>Good</strong></p>
                            <p>Further information can be found on our <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/life/international/english-requirements">English language requirements</a> page.</p>
                        </section>
                        <section>
                            <h5>International students</h5>
                            <p>Country-specific information, including details of when UCL representatives are visiting your part of the world, can be obtained from the <a class="clicktracker international" href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/international">International Students website</a>.</p>
                            
                            <p>International applicants can find out the equivalent qualification for their country by selecting from the list below.</p>

<dt class="accordion__title"><a href="#">Degree Information</a></dt>
<dd class="accordion__description" style="display: none;">
     <div>
<html>

    
        <script>
            require(["theme/tabs"]);
            require(["theme/ug"]);
        </script>
        <script>            var ajaxyear = '2018';
                                                var ajaxroot = 'http://www.ucl.ac.uk/indigo-ucl-prospectus-taught-degrees';</script>
        



            
                
                

                 <div class="prospectus--programme prospectus--programme--last">
                        

                        

                        

                        
                            
       
            <section id="key-information" class="copy__section copy__section--key__information">
                <div class="island island--highlight island--subtle-highlight clearfix">
                    <h3 class="copy__heading">Key Information</h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        <div class="clearfix">
                            <h5>Programme starts</h5>
                            <p>September 2018</p>
                        </div>
                    

                    <section class="threecolumns">
                        

                        

                        
                    </section>

                    

                    

                    

                   <div>
                        
                        
                        <div>
                            <strong>Location:</strong> London, Bloomsbury
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <hr class="clearfix">
                    
                </div>
            </section>
        
    
                        

                        
                            <section class="copy__section copy__section--degree__information collapse">
                                <h3 class="copy__heading collapse__header">Degree Information</h3>
                                <div class="collapse__content">
                                    <p><p>The programme allows students to develop an advanced knowledge of problems in contemporary analytic philosophy, the history of philosophy and the study of value. It provides students with an understanding of a representative range of central philosophical debates and of the nature of philosophical problems, and encourages them to develop and defend their own viewpoint.</p></p>
                                    <p>Students undertake modules to the value of 180 credits.</p>
                                    <p><p>The programme consists of two core modules (30 credits), six optional modules (90 credits) and a research dissertation (60 credits).</p></p>
                                    
                                    
                                    
                                    
                                    <div class="clearfix">
                                        <div class="copy__column dc1-dc2">
                                            <h5>Core modules</h5>
                                            
                                                <div><p>These modules introduce students to graduate study in philosophy. Students will give short presentations on central topics and classic papers which form the basis of discussion.</p></div>
                                                <ul>
                                                    
                                                        <li>Research Preparation in Philosophy 1</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Research Preparation in Philosophy 2</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                </ul>
                                                
                                            
                                            
                                            <h5>Optional modules</h5>
                                            
                                                <div><p>Options may include the following:&nbsp;</p></div>
                                                <ul>
                                                    
                                                        <li>Foundations of Effective Altruism</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Intentional Agency, Acting for a Reason and Responsibility</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Early Wittgenstein</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Epistemology</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Self-Knowledge</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Philosophy of Mind</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Global Justice and Health</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Free Speech</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Greek Philosophy</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Nineteenth Century Philosophy</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Philosophy of Mind and Cognitive Science</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Metaphysics of Science</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>The Self in Early Analytic Philosophy</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Sartre’s Philosophy</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Epistemology of Disagreement</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Equality</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Recent Work in Practical Philosophy</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Graduate Studies in the Philosophy of Language</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        <li>Perception and its History</li>
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                    
                                                </ul>
                                                
                                            
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="copy__column dc3-dc4">
                                            
                                                <h5>Dissertation/report</h5>
                                                <p><p>All students undertake an independent research project in any area of philosophy taught and approved by the department, leading to in a dissertation of 12,000 words.</p></p>
                                            
                                            <h5>Teaching and Learning</h5>
                                            <p><p>The programme is taught through a combination of seminars, lectures, and supervisions. Students' performance is assessed through examinations, presentations, coursework, and the dissertation.</p></p>
                                            
                                            
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="clearfix">
                                        Further information on modules and degree structure is available on the department website: 
                                        <a
    href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught/philosophy-ma">Philosophy MA</a>
                                    </p>
                                </div>
                            </section>
                        


                        

                        
    
       
                        
    

                        


                        
                        
                        
    
                        

                        

                        

                        <p class="zero-bottom">
                            Degree last modified on 6 October 2017 at 13:41 by UCL Student Recruitment Marketing.
                        </p>
                    </div>

                    

                
            
        
    
</html>

</div>
  </dd>

<dt class="accordion__title"><a href="#">Careers</a></dt>
<dd class="accordion__description" style="display: none;">
     <div>

            require(["theme/ug"]);
        </script>

                 <div class="prospectus--programme prospectus--programme--last">
                        

                        

                        

                        
                            
       
            <section id="key-information" class="copy__section copy__section--key__information">
                <div class="island island--highlight island--subtle-highlight clearfix">
                    <h3 class="copy__heading">Key Information</h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        <div class="clearfix">
                            <h5>Programme starts</h5>
                            <p>September 2018</p>
                        </div>
                    

                    <section class="threecolumns">

                            <section class="copy__section copy__section--careers collapse">
                                <h3 class="copy__heading collapse__header">Careers</h3>
                                <div class="collapse__content">
                                    

                                    <p><p>Graduates of this programme have become successful lawyers, journalists, theatre directors and novelists among other careers. Those who perform sufficiently well on the MA can expect to pursue further research in philosophy in London or elsewhere.</p></p>
                                    <div class="clearfix">

                                        <div
    class="copy__column dc1-dc2">
                                            <h5>Recent career destinations for this degree</h5>
                                            <ul>
                                                
                                                    <li>BPTC (Bar Professional Training Course), University of Law</li>
                                                
                                                
                                                    <li>MFA in Creative Writing, Queens University of Charlotte, North Carolina</li>
                                                
                                                
                                                    <li>MPhil in Greek and Latin, UCL</li>
                                                
                                                
                                                    <li>MPhil Stud in Philosophy, UCL</li>
                                                
                                            </ul>
                                        </div>
                                        <div
    class="copy__column dc3-dc4">
                                            <h5>Employability</h5>
                                            <p><p>The programme equips graduates with the skills to analyse complex ideas, develop independence of judgement and originality of thought, evaluate arguments rigorously, present views lucidly both orally and on paper, and question orthodox views. The programme provides an ideal basis for future academic study and many graduates proceed to research degrees in the UK and abroad.</p></p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                     <div class="clearfix">

                                        
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="clearfix">

                                        <div
    class="copy__column">
                                            <p
    class="small text-muted">Careers data is taken from the ‘Destinations of Leavers from Higher Education’ survey undertaken by HESA looking at the destinations of UK and EU students in the 2012–2014 graduating cohorts six months after graduation.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                               </div>
                            </section>

<dt class="accordion__title"><a href="#">Why study this degree at UCL?</a></dt>
<dd class="accordion__description" style="display: none;">
     <div>
<html>

    
        <script>
            require(["theme/tabs"]);
            require(["theme/ug"]);
        </script>
        <script>            var ajaxyear = '2018';
                                                var ajaxroot = 'http://www.ucl.ac.uk/indigo-ucl-prospectus-taught-degrees';</script>
        



            
                
                

                 <div class="prospectus--programme prospectus--programme--last">
                        

                        

                        

                        
                            
       
            <section id="key-information" class="copy__section copy__section--key__information">
                <div class="island island--highlight island--subtle-highlight clearfix">
                    <h3 class="copy__heading">Key Information</h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        <div class="clearfix">
                            <h5>Programme starts</h5>
                            <p>September 2018</p>
                        </div>
                    

                    <section class="threecolumns">
                        

                        

                        
                    </section>

                    

                    

                    

                   <div>
                        
                        
                        <div>
                            <strong>Location:</strong> London, Bloomsbury
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <hr class="clearfix">
                    
                </div>
            </section>
        
    
                        

                        


                        

                        
    
       
                        
    

                        
                            <section class="copy__section copy__section--why__ucl collapse">
                                <h3 class="copy__heading collapse__header">Why study this degree at UCL?</h3>
                                <div class="collapse__content">
                                    
                                        
                                            <p><p>The department has strengths in philosophy of mind, language, political and moral philosophy, metaphysics, epistemology and the history of philosophy.</p></p>
                                            <p><p>Our students benefit significantly from our location in London, which is one of the international centres of philosophical activity. London is home of a number of renowned journals (<em>Philosophy</em>; <em>Mind &amp; Language</em>; <em>Proceedings of the Aristotelian Society</em>) and hosts regular visiting speakers from across the world. Over 60 philosophers are active in London making it one of the largest and most varied philosophical communities in the world.</p></p>
                                            
                                        
                                        
                                        <p>
                                            <strong>Department:</strong> <a
    href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy"
    class="clicktracker departmenttaught">Philosophy</a>
                                        </p>
                                        <p>
                                            <strong>Student / staff ratios</strong>
                                            
                                                &rsaquo; 22 staff
                                                
                                                    including 2 postdocs
                                                
                                            
                                            
                                                &rsaquo; 22 taught students
                                            
                                            
                                                &rsaquo; 61 research students
                                            
                                        </p>
                                        
                                            <h4>Research Excellence Framework (REF)</h4>
                                            
                                            <p>The <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/ref2014">Research Excellence Framework</a>, or REF, is the system for assessing the quality of research in UK higher education institutions. The 2014 REF was carried out by the UK's higher education funding bodies, and the results used to allocate research funding from 2015/16.</p>
                                            <p>
                                                The following REF score was awarded to the department: Philosophy<br />
                                                75% rated 4* (&#145;world-leading&#146;) or 3* (&#145;internationally excellent&#146;)
                                            </p>
                                            <p>Learn more about the scope of UCL's research, and browse case studies, on our <a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/impact/">Research Impact website</a>.</p>
                                        
                                        

                                    

                                    
                                </div>
                            </section>
                        


                        
                        
                        
    
                        

                        

                        

                        <p class="zero-bottom">
                            Degree last modified on 6 October 2017 at 13:41 by UCL Student Recruitment Marketing.
                        </p>
                    </div>

                    

                
            
        
    
</html>

</div>
  </dd>
        
    
    

<dt class="accordion__title"><a href="#">Applications and next steps</a></dt>
<dd class="accordion__description" style="display: none;">
     <div>
<html>

    
        <script>
            require(["theme/tabs"]);
            require(["theme/ug"]);
        </script>
        <script>            var ajaxyear = '2018';
                                                var ajaxroot = 'http://www.ucl.ac.uk/indigo-ucl-prospectus-taught-degrees';</script>
        



            
                
                

                 <div class="prospectus--programme prospectus--programme--last">
                        

                        

                        

                        
                            
       
            <section id="key-information" class="copy__section copy__section--key__information">
                <div class="island island--highlight island--subtle-highlight clearfix">
                    <h3 class="copy__heading">Key Information</h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                    

                    
                        <div class="clearfix">
                            <h5>Programme starts</h5>
                            <p>September 2018</p>
                        </div>
                    

                    <section class="threecolumns">
                        

                        

                        
                    </section>

                    

                    

                    

                   <div>
                        
                        
                        <div>
                            <strong>Location:</strong> London, Bloomsbury
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <hr class="clearfix">
                    
                </div>
            </section>
        
    
                        

                        


                        

                        
    
       
                        
    

                        


                        
                            <section class="copy__section copy__section--application collapse">
                                <h3 id="application" class="copy__heading collapse__header">Application and next steps</h3>
                                <div class="collapse__content">
                                    
                                        <h4>Applications</h4>
                                        <p>Students are advised to apply as early as possible due to competition for places. Those applying for scholarship funding (particularly overseas applicants) should take note of application deadlines.</p>
                                        <div class="clearfix">
                                            <div
    class="copy__column dc1-dc2">
                                                
                                                    <h5>Who can apply?</h5>
                                                    <p><p>The MA offers a means to study philosophy for an additional year after completing an undergraduate degree and also provides a good basis for work outside of universities. Philosophy graduates who wish to develop a career in teaching philosophy are advised to apply directly for the MPhil Stud.</p></p>
                                                
                                                <div>
                                                    <h5>Application deadlines</h5>
                                                    <dl class="list--defined">
                                                        
                                                            <dt>All applicants</dt>
                                                            <dd>1 February 2018</dd>
                                                        
                                                        
                                                        
                                                    </dl>
                                                    
                                                    <p
    on-error="string:"><p>Applications close on 1 February each year and early submission is recommended.</p></p>
                                                    
                                                </div>
                                                
                                                    <br><p>For more information see our <a
    href="/prospective-students/graduate/apply">Applications</a> page.</p>
                                                    <a
    class="cta btn prospectus"
    href="/prospective-students/graduate/apply"
    onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent','PGT (widget) apply clicks','Click','http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught/philosophy-ma'])">Apply now</a>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                            <div
    class="copy__column dc3-dc4">
                                                <h5>What are we looking for?</h5>
                                                <p
    condition="app_look_1"><p>When we assess your application we would like to learn:</p><ul> 

<li>why you want to study Philosophy at graduate level</li> <li>why you want to study Philosophy at UCL</li> <li>what particularly attracts you to this programme </li> <li>how your academic and/or professional background meets the demands of a challenging academic environment </li> <li>where you would like to go professionally with your degree </li> 

</ul><p>Together with essential academic requirements, the personal statement is your opportunity to illustrate whether your reasons for applying to this programme match what the programme offers.</p></p>
                                                <p
    condition="app_look_2"></p>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    

                                    
                                </div>
                            </section>        
                        
                        
                        
    
                        

                        

                        

                        <p class="zero-bottom">
                            Degree last modified on 6 October 2017 at 13:41 by UCL Student Recruitment Marketing.
                        </p>
                    </div>

                    

                
            
        
    
</html>

</div>
  </dd>
        
    
    

<dt class="accordion__title"><a href="#">Programme contacts</a></dt>
<dd class="accordion__description" style="display: none;">
     <div>

<h2 class="heading">Contact Information</h2>





<ul class="disc">
<li>Mr Richard Edwards</li>
<li><a href="mailto:philosophy@ucl.ac.uk">philosophy@ucl.ac.uk</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-research/philosophical-studies-mphil-stud/accordion/tel:+44%20%280%2920%207679%207115">+44 (0)20 7679 7115</a></li>
</ul>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy">Philosophy</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.google.co.uk/maps/place/University+College+London/@51.5244151,-0.1337821,17z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x48761b2f69173579:0xd008c67faecc133e" target="_self">UCL UK Campus</a></li>
</ul>

</div>
  </dd>
        
    
</dl>
 

</div>

                <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy"
                   data-href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy">UCL Philosophy</a>
                <!--[if lte IE 7]>&raquo;<![endif]-->
            </li>
            <li class="breadcrumb__item">
                <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students"
                   data-href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students">Prospective Students</a>
                <!--[if lte IE 7]>&raquo;<![endif]-->
            </li>
            <li class="breadcrumb__item">
                <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught"
                   data-href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught">Graduate (Taught)</a>
                <!--[if lte IE 7]>&raquo;<![endif]-->
            </li>
            <li class="breadcrumb__item">
                <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught/philosophy-ma"
                   data-href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught/philosophy-ma">Philosophy MA</a>
                <!--[if lte IE 7]>&raquo;<![endif]-->
            </li>
            <li class="breadcrumb__item">
                <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught/philosophy-ma/academic-voice"
                   data-href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/graduate-taught/philosophy-ma/academic-voice">Academic Voice</a>
                
            </li>
        </ul>
    </nav>

                    <!--endnoindex-->
                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">Academic Voice</h1>
<img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/people/permanent-academic-staff/sebastian-gardner/SG_web.jpg" width="214" height="265" alt="Professor Sebastian Gardner" class="small-image float-right" title="Professor Sebastian Gardner" /><p class="p">Prof. Sebasatian Gardner – Professor of Philosophy</p>
<p class="p"> </p>
<p class="p">“UCL provides a superb context for pursuing postgraduate
study in Philosophy. The Department is ranked among the best in the country for
its research and attaches the highest importance to its teaching. MA students
have the opportunity to engage intensively with a wide variety of areas in and
approaches to philosophy and its history, receive full support and
encouragement, and achieve striking results. After completing the MA many
proceed to research degrees.”</p>


<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Scholarships &amp; Funding</h2>
<ul class="disc">

<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/fees-funding" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>

<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Resarch)</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>

                                  <div class="info">
                                    <h2 class="heading">The resource cannot be found</h2>
                                    <p class="p">
                                      <acronym title="Uniform Resource Locator">URL</acronym>:
                                      http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/mphil-stud-phd
                                      <br /><br />
                                    </p>
                                    <h4 class="heading">
                                      Most likely causes:
                                    </h4>
                                      <ul>
                                          <li>There might be a typing error in the address.</li>
                                          <li>If you clicked on a link, it may be out of date.</li>
                                      </ul>
                                    <h4 class="heading">
                                      What you can try:
                                    </h4>
                                      <ul>
                                          <li>Retype the address.</li>
                                          <li>Use the search box above to find what you're looking for.</li>
                                          <li>Go to <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk" title="UCL Website">www.ucl.ac.uk</a> and look for the information you want.</li>
                                          <li><a href="javascript:history.back()" title="Back to previous page">Go back to the previous page.</a></li>
                                      </ul>
                                    <h4 class="heading">
                                      More information:
                                    </h4>
                                    <p class="p">
                                        This error (<acronym title="Hypertext Transfer Protocol">HTTP</acronym> 404 Not Found) means that you have connected to the UCL Website, but the page you wanted was not found. It's possible that the webpage is temporarily unavailable. Alternatively, the UCL Website might have changed or removed the webpage. 
                                    </p>
                                  </div>

                                  <div class="info">
                                    <h2 class="heading">The resource cannot be found</h2>
                                    <p class="p">
                                      <acronym title="Uniform Resource Locator">URL</acronym>:
                                      http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/mphil-stud-phd
                                      <br /><br />
                                    </p>
                                    <h4 class="heading">
                                      Most likely causes:
                                    </h4>
                                      <ul>
                                          <li>There might be a typing error in the address.</li>
                                          <li>If you clicked on a link, it may be out of date.</li>
                                      </ul>
                                    <h4 class="heading">
                                      What you can try:
                                    </h4>
                                      <ul>
                                          <li>Retype the address.</li>
                                          <li>Use the search box above to find what you're looking for.</li>
                                          <li>Go to <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk" title="UCL Website">www.ucl.ac.uk</a> and look for the information you want.</li>
                                          <li><a href="javascript:history.back()" title="Back to previous page">Go back to the previous page.</a></li>
                                      </ul>
                                    <h4 class="heading">
                                      More information:
                                    </h4>
                                    <p class="p">
                                        This error (<acronym title="Hypertext Transfer Protocol">HTTP</acronym> 404 Not Found) means that you have connected to the UCL Website, but the page you wanted was not found. It's possible that the webpage is temporarily unavailable. Alternatively, the UCL Website might have changed or removed the webpage. 
                                    </p>
                                  </div>

<h1 class="heading">Student Testimonials</h1>

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>

                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">Postgraduate (Research)</h1>
<img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/images/student-testimonials/Male_Chinese_student.jpg" width="293" height="440" alt="Student" class="small-image float-right" title="Student" />

<h3 class="heading">Hong Yu Wong - Philosophical Studies MPhil Stud</h3>




<p class="p"> &quot;The programme is unique in training its students
rigorously but with a personal touch. The class is small and this allows for
one to receive adequate attention from faculty members and interact with all of
one's peers. I found the compulsory practical criticism class especially useful
for honing my skills in reading closely and critically. The tutorial system
allows for great flexibility in pursuing one's interests in depth and also
acquiring a broad education in philosophy. Studying philosophy at UCL combines
the advantages of being in an intimate college atmosphere and being in a large
research environment, since there are several other excellent philosophy
departments in London and a thriving philosophy scene.&quot;</p>
<hr class="rule" />
<img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/images/student-testimonials/Student__male_.jpg" width="309" height="439" alt="Student" class="small-image float-left" title="Student" />

<h3 class="heading">Thomas Smith - PhD </h3>




<p class="p">  &quot;For me, UCL was a place that you looked forward to going
to each day. You looked forward to the seminars, the supervisions,
the reading groups and the evenings in the pub, because they were fun, because
the people were interesting and unpretentious, and because you learned
something from them. London is a terrific place to philosophise: there
are so many excellent people working or visiting there at any time, and so
much going on, formally and informally, that even if one never read a single
thing, one would have a sense of immunity from ignorance of the latest ideas.&quot; </p>


<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Scholarships &amp; Funding</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/scholarships" target="_self">Scholarships &amp; Funding (Overview)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/fees-funding" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/taught/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Taught)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Resarch)</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i>

                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">Postgraduate (Taught)</h1>
<img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/images/student-testimonials/Student__female__-_2.jpg" width="330" height="440" alt="Student" class="small-image float-right" title="Student" />

<h3 class="heading">MM – Philosophy MA </h3>




<p class="p">  &quot;Having shopped around a little I chose to apply for the philosophy MA at
UCL. It seemed a good option: a one year commitment at a top-rated philosophy
department (not to mention the MA's inter-collegiate nature, giving access to
philosophers throughout London), and a chance to try out a fairly wide range of
subjects. The year went well and I was able to work closely in tutorials with a
number of the UCL philosophers. I'm now a little clearer, having dabbled in a
number of subjects in the course of the MA, as to which areas I now want to
focus on. I'm starting the MPhil Stud at UCL this coming year, and looking
forward to it immensely.&quot;</p>


<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Scholarships &amp; Funding</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/scholarships" target="_self">Scholarships &amp; Funding (Overview)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/fees-funding" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>

<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Resarch)</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i>

            <li class="footer__item">
                <span class="silva-edit-cross"><a
    rel="nofollow"
    href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/student-testimonials/postgraduate-taught/edit"><img class="zero-bottom lazy" height="10" width="10" alt="Edit Icon" title="Edit Content" src="//cdn.ucl.ac.uk/img/blank.gif" data-src="//cdn.ucl.ac.uk/skins/UCLIndigoSkin/default-theme/images/edit.gif" id="edit_button"></a></span>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</footer>

  }

                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">Undergraduate</h1>
<img src="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/images/student-testimonials/Student__female_.jpg" width="300" height="439" alt="Student" class="small-image float-right" title="Student" />

<h3 class="heading">Anna Smith - Philosophy BA</h3>




<p class="p">




 &quot;I chose to come to UCL primarily because of the strength of the department.
As one of the leading centres in the philosophy of perception, it was an
obvious choice. Intellectually, my time at UCL was as stimulating and
challenging as I had hoped it would be and immensely
enjoyable. The department is down-to-earth, friendly, and very sociable. My time there was an incredibly rewarding experience.&quot;</p>


<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">
                                        <hr />
                <div id="content-footer"></div>

                    </div>

                    </div>
                     <div class="content-sidebar">
                                        <div class="site-content__sidebar">

<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">UCL+</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Register interest in your chosen subjects</li>
<li>Request a printed prospectus</li>
<li>Receive notice of undergraduate open days, events and more</li>
<li><a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/ucl-plus" target="_self">Sign Up ...&gt;&gt;</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Scholarships &amp; Funding</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/scholarships" target="_self">Scholarships &amp; Funding (Overview)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/fees-funding" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/taught/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Taught)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/fees-funding" target="_self">Postgraduate (Resarch)</a></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Open Days</h2>
<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/undergraduate/events" target="_self">Undergraduate</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/taught/events" target="_self">Postgraduate (Taught)</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/graduate/research/events" target="_self">Postgraduate (Research)</a><br /></li>
</ul>


</section>

</div>


<h3 class="heading"></h3>






<div class="prebox">
<section class="box box--None">
  
  <i class="fa None"></i> 
  <h2 class="heading">Accommodation</h2>

</ul>

  var dom,doc,where,iframe = document.createElement("iframe"),win = window;

  function boomerangSaveLoadTime(e) {
    win.BOOMR_onload=(e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }
  if (win.addEventListener) {
    win.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false);
  } else if (win.attachEvent) {
    win.attachEvent("onload", boomerangSaveLoadTime);
  }

  iframe.src = "javascript:void(0)";
  iframe.title = ""; iframe.role = "presentation";
  (iframe.frameElement || iframe).style.cssText = "width:0;height:0;border:0;display:none;";
  where = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
  where.parentNode.insertBefore(iframe, where);

  try {
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  } catch(e) {
    dom = document.domain;
    iframe.src="javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='"+dom+"';void(0);";
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  }
  doc.open()._l = function() {
    var js = this.createElement("script");
    if (dom) { this.domain = dom; }
    js.id = "boomr-if-as";

    BOOMR_lstart=new Date().getTime();
    this.body.appendChild(js);
  };
  doc.write('<body onload="document._l();">');
  doc.close();
})();
</script>

                   data-href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/philosophy/prospective-students/study-abroad-at-ucl">Study Abroad at UCL</a>
                
            </li>

                    <div class="site-content__main">

                        <article class="article clearfix">
                            <!-- Start Silva content --> 
<h1 class="heading">Study Abroad at UCL</h1>
<p class="p">The Philosophy department regularly welcomes study abroad students and we pride ourselves on our supportive learning environment. We offer a range of courses across political and moral philosophy, epistemology, metaphysics and much more. Our courses equip students with the tools and skills needed to challenge, analyse and present complex ideas and problems, whether this be the distinction between right and wrong, questions of the state, liberty and law, or ethics, logic and the nature of knowledge and belief.</p>

<h2 class="heading">Why choose UCL?</h2>





<ul class="disc">
</ul>
<ul class="disc">
<li>Access to dedicated <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/iss " target="_self">welcome orientations and events</a> as well as societies 
and clubs within your department and across UCL</li>
<li>Study alongside regular UCL and international students and become truly integrated into student life</li>
<li>Benefit from
     our world-class teaching system and renowned academics</li>
<li>Take courses across a range of UCL subjects and departments to suit
     your interests</li>
<li>Get support and guidance from your own academic tutor (an 'Affiliate Tutor')</li>
<li>Our dedicated departure event <a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/study-abroad-ucl/study-abroad-guide/life-after-london " target="_self">Life
     After London</a> will enable you to discover how to use the skills you've gained to your advantage in the job market.</li>
</ul>
<p class="p">As part of the Philosophy department, you'll have access
     to meetings and events at the Royal Institute of Philosophy, the
     Aristotelian Society and the University of London’s Institute of
     Philosophy.</p>
<article class="blurb">

    <div class="blurb--video none video--small">
        <div class=" video-wrap video--captioned">
	        <iframe frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""
                 src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XInVK7_cTuY"></iframe>
	        
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="blurb__body">
        <h1 class="blurb__title"><a
    href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XInVK7_cTuY">What is it like to be a Study Abroad student here?</a></h1>
        <p>UCL's history, reputation and academic standing makes it a top destination for study abroad in the UK. Come and study alongside regular UCL and international students and benefit from our world-class teaching system and renowned academics.</p>

    </div>
</article>
<ul class="disc">
</ul>

<h2 class="heading"></h2>






<h2 class="heading">Further Information</h2>





<ul class="disc">
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/prospective-students/international/affiliate" target="_self">UCL Study Abroad Pages</a> (admission, term dates, fees and
     application forms)</li>
<li><a href="http://www.ucl.ac.uk/sag" target="_self">Study Abroad Guide </a>(information
     on UCL's study abroad programme) </li>
<li><a href="/silva/philosophy/current-students/ba-programmes/ba-courses" target="_self">Philosophy Courses </a>(current course listing
     for this academic year)</li>
</ul>
<p class="p"> If you are looking to study in the Philosophy department as an
Erasmus student, you will need to check an Erasmus agreement is in place with
your institution and apply via this route.</p>
<p class="p"> We look forward to welcoming you at UCL Philosophy!</p>
<p class="p"> You can contact the department at: <a href="mailto:philosophy@ucl.ac.uk">philosophy@ucl.ac.uk.</a> </p>


<!-- End Silva content --> 

                        </article>

                    <div class="content-footer">

                    </div>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

(function(){
  if (window.BOOMR && window.BOOMR.version) { return; }
  var dom,doc,where,iframe = document.createElement("iframe"),win = window;

  function boomerangSaveLoadTime(e) {
    win.BOOMR_onload=(e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }
  if (win.addEventListener) {
    win.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false);
  } else if (win.attachEvent) {
    win.attachEvent("onload", boomerangSaveLoadTime);
  }

  iframe.src = "javascript:void(0)";
  iframe.title = ""; iframe.role = "presentation";
  (iframe.frameElement || iframe).style.cssText = "width:0;height:0;border:0;display:none;";
  where = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
  where.parentNode.insertBefore(iframe, where);

  try {
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  } catch(e) {
    dom = document.domain;
    iframe.src="javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='"+dom+"';void(0);";
    doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
  }
  doc.open()._l = function() {
    var js = this.createElement("script");
    if (dom) { this.domain = dom; }
    js.id = "boomr-if-as";
    js.src = "//c.go-mpulse.net/boomerang/" +
    "SUWW2-HAKPB-Q4WN7-TQ6VL-GTMT2";
    BOOMR_lstart=new Date().getTime();
    this.body.appendChild(js);
  };
  doc.write('<body onload="document._l();">');
  doc.close();
})();
</script>


        <link id="respond-proxy" rel="respond-proxy"
              href="//cdn.ucl.ac.uk/indigo/js/respond-x-domain/respond-proxy.html" />
        <link href="/globals/respond.proxy.gif" id="respond-redirect" rel="respond-redirect" />

<h1 class="heading">Undergraduate</h1>
<!-- Subtemplate: 2 columns with 50/50 division -->  
<section class="middle-split"> 

  <section class="middle-split__column1">
